decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 20018 / GA / 001 Rev P2 (Ground & Mezzanine Layouts - Layout, footing, joist, padstone detail); BCH-P099-S2- Rev P0 (Basement Floor Plan - Proposed); BCH-P202-S2- Rev P3 (East Elevation - Proposed); BCH-P100-S2- Rev P6 (Ground Floor Plan - Proposed); BCH-P101-S2- Rev P4 (Mezzanine Floor Plan - Proposed); BCH-P200-S2- Rev P1 (North Elevation - Proposed); BCH-P300-S2- Rev P1 (Section AA - Proposed); BCH-P301-S2- Rev P1 (Section BB - Proposed); BCH-P302-S2- Rev P0 amended 27.01.21 (Section CC - Proposed); BCH-P303-S2- Rev P1 (Section DD - Proposed); BCH-P304-S2- Rev P1 (Section EE - Proposed); BCH-P201-S2- Rev P1 (South Elevation - Proposed); BCH-P203-S2- Rev P2 (West Elevation - Proposed); Schedule of Dilapidations; Site Survey dated 9th December 2020 (prepared by Rom Construction); Drawing of connection to existing drains (prepared by ROM construction); Drawing of mezzanine beam end detail (prepared by ROM construction); Drawing of parquet overboard (prepared by ROM Construction); Drawing of section of drainpipe and manhole (prepared by ROM construction); Drawing of Trial Holes 1,2 and 3 (prepared by ROM construction); Product specification of air conditioning units (Mr Slim Inverter Cassette Range); Product specification of inverter heat pump (MSZ-LN Inverter Heat Pump).

Condition : 4 - No works to the tiling, other than the removal of the overboarding to expose the existing tiles, shall be carried out until a site inspection has been undertaken by the Conservation officer to assess their condition and written approval provided by the Local Planning Authority on the restoration/repair schedule. 

Reason: In the interests of the appearance of the Listed Building and to ensure a satisfactory appearance of the development, and to comply with the following Development Plan policies for Merton: policy HC1 of the London Plan 2021, policy CS14 of Merton's Core Planning Strategy 2011 and policies DM D2, DM D3 and DM D4 of Merton's Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Condition : 5 - No demolition or construction work or ancillary activities such as deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 6pm Mondays - Fridays inclusive, before 8am or after 1pm on Saturdays or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 6 - Noise levels, (expressed as the equivalent continuous sound level) LAeq (15 minutes), from the new air conditioning units shall not exceed LA90-10dB at the boundary with any noise sensitive property not associated with the development.  

Reason: To protect the amenities of neighbouring residential properties and to comply with the following Development Plan policies for Merton: policies D13 and D14 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM EP2 of the Adopted Merton Sites and Policies Plan (2014).

Condition : 7 - INFORMATIVE: The applicant is reminded that the lawful use of the existing building as a day nursery falls under Class E(f) of The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) (Amendment)(England) Regulations 2020. Change of use in the future to any operation falling outside this Class shall require planning permission.

Condition : 8 - INFORMATIVE: The applicant is reminded that, notwithstanding the works permitted under this Planning Permission, the works shall be carried out in conjunction with the Listed Building Consent and attached conditions reference 20/P2426.

Condition : 9 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The application was amended following discussion with the Conservation officer and is now considered acceptable. 
   ii) The application was approved with an agreement to an extension of time.
description: USE OF EXISTING BUILDING FOR DAY NURSERY, AND ALTERATIONS TO PROVIDE ADDITIONAL FLOORSPACE INCLUDING WORKS TO INCLUDE:  INSTALLATION OF MEZZANINE FLOOR TO PART OF THE MAIN HALL WITH ASSOCIATED STRUCTURAL SUPPORT, PARTITIONING, DRAINAGE, ACCESS AND SECONDARY GLAZING TO EXTERNAL WINDOWS (PART - UPPER LEVEL), INSTALLATION OF AIR CONDITIONING AND VENTILATION SYSTEM WITH ASSOCIATED WORKS.
